title: Eureka Canister Vacuum Cleaner, Lightweight Vacuum Cleaner for Carpets and Hard Floors, NEN170 Pet Friendly vaccum Cleaner with with HEPA Filter and 4 dust Bags, Silver with Green
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.
EUREKA NEN170 Canister Vacuum Cleaner provides up to 150w suction power and 18KPA vacuum degree, resulting in low consumption and high efficiency, and cleaning with powerful suction.
The highest noise level of carpet cleaning can be as low as 72db(A). The operation sound is is comparatively quiet, causing low disruption to others.
The filtration system with 99.9% filtration efficiency is fully sealed, which can capture fine dust as small as 0.3um, and prevent secondary pollution.

Switch seamlessly between floor and carpet cleaning modes with our versatile vacuum cleaner. Featuring a foot-activated switch that allows you to switch modes without bending over, ensuring a convenient and comfortable cleaning experience.

EUREKA NEN170 canister vacuum cleaner for home comes with multiple accessories providing versatile cleaning for every scenario: The telescopic metal wand for above floor and under furniture cleaning, crevice tool for dust from sofa, keyboard and gap, dusting brush for debris from furniture surface. The turbo pet brush which can quickly removes lint and dust from sofas, cushions, curtains, pet hair, and more, providing ultimate cleaning solution for pet owners.
If you have any questions,contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886
